summary:
Fallingwater Estate is a Grand Player Lodge & Property located near Orotheim Cave. 
Not only do you get the best and most incredible view of Skyrim and the River, you also get: 
-A very cozy and very Custom dwelling for you to call home; complete with... 
+Grand Entrance/Foyer, with Several means of Displaying your finest wares found throughout
descriptionHtml:
Fallingwater Estate is a Grand Player Lodge & Property located near Orotheim Cave. 

No DLCs required; Enjoy! 

This is just a little mod I put together in between my Fort Projects. 
(Go Check out Fort Winstad and Fort Heljarchen if you haven\\\'t yet!) 

Not only do you get the best and most incredible view of Skyrim and the River, you also get: 

-A very cozy and very Custom dwelling for you to call home; complete with... 
+Grand Entrance/Foyer, with Several means of Displaying your finest wares found throughout Skyrim. 
+3 Bedrooms 
+Dining Hall & Kitchen 
+Pub 
+Housecarl to Patrol and Monitor your new, highly sought after Property. 
+Dynamic Interior Lighting that adjusts to the time of day. 

-Rooftop Patio with Access to Indoors via Second Floor 

-Outdoor Smithing Shop with Storage Chest and Supplies 

-Lookout Perch 

-Waterfall (if you place it juuust right, you can jump off and survive) 

-Exterior Lighting to find your way around in the Dark 


Known Bugs: 

-Mannequins might walk around. This is a known Bug within Skyrim. Pretty sure Bethesda is working on a fix.(They\\\'ve only walked around once for me, and I just left the house and came back in and its been fine ever since.) 

-Might be a piece of cheese on the floor in the Dining Hall. Trying to find where its coming from. 

-Shield-mount above the Dagger Display Cases might place your shield at the wrong angle. Working on this. 


FAQ 

Q:Where is it?! 

A: Location Map provided. Near Crabbers Shanty and Orotheim Cave. 
Fast Travel also available right off the bat for those that don\\\'t want to bother with the trek. I personally love the walk up to Fallingwater.
author: AlphaJoe
